name: tree-view-plus
description: Explore and open files in the current project.

tree-view.description: A tree-like view of directories and files

sortMethod.description: Method used to sort files and directories in the tree view.

sortFoldersBeforeFiles.description: When listing directory items, list subdirectories before listing files.

sortByBase.description: Sort by filename base and extension independently. Files with the same base name are grouped together.

showOnRightSide.description: Show the tree view on the right side of the workspace.

squashDirectoryNames.title: Collapse directories
squashDirectoryNames.description: Collapse directories that only contain a single directory.

hideVcsIgnoredFiles.title: Hide VCS Ignored Files
hideVcsIgnoredFiles.description: Don't show files and directories ignored by the current project's VCS system. For example, projects using Git have these paths defined in their `.gitignore` file.

hideIgnoredNames.description: Don't show items matched by the `Ignored Names` core config setting.

autoReveal.description: Reveal tree view entries when they become the active pane item.

focusOnReveal.description: Focus the tree view when revealing entries.

alwaysOpenExisting.description: When opening a file, always focus an already-existing view of the file even if it's in another pane.

hiddenOnStartup.description: When Pulsar is opened, the view is hidden.

isPermanent.description: When enabled, the tree view becomes a permanent dock item that cannot be closed.
